channel.title: CVE Feed for cainthebest -- nitrado.js
channel.description: The latest CVEs for cainthebest -- nitrado.js

item.title: CVE-2022-36034|2024-08-03T09:52:00.167Z -- cainthebest -- nitrado.js
item.description: nitrado.js is a type safe wrapper for the Nitrado API. Possible ReDoS with lib input of `{{` and with many repetitions of `{{|`. This issue has been patched in all versions above `0.2.5`. There are currently no known workarounds.
